lines.text: What do I want to do? I want to blow a hole in your head and donate your organs to science, but I've got a few questions first.
Why'd they leave?
They didn't leave.
How do you know?
Because we aren't dead yet.
I get so damned apocalyptic when I drink.
[right before he kills an alien]
Do you want to see the ruins, my friend?
What's your point? There's always something that gives me false hope? That I'm wasting my life?
I didn't say that. But you know, it's interesting that you did.
Zane, you don't look too good.
I look like a can of smashed assholes.
She's out of my bed, but still in my head.
If you can't tend to your own planet, you don't deserve to live here.
Searching for ETs in this political environment is a tough sell.
This is like looking for a needle in a haystack full of needles.
I come to you with what may be the preeminent discovery of the 20th century, the possibility of extra-solar life, and I get shit-canned for it?

[looking towards old, scruffy building]
Posada San Marsol. One of our much very best hotels!
If you ever get the chance to travel with a Mexican rodeo... pass.
What is this, Tales from the Darkside?
You know, I must say, Zane, I really enjoyed our talk tonight. It's uncommon for me to find someone who can actually grasp the things that I'm passionate about.
Yeah, I hear ya.
